title: i cant reconnect or play any games
body:
every time i try to play a game my game doesnt start and going to the loading screen where it shows all the champions on both teams and if i turn the game off and restart to join again i can reconnect ethier
Please help me, my acc so will get banned cause of this and i dont know how to fix it.

replies.body: After you complete champion select, your network has to transition over to the game server but can't make that connection.  I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
